left.text: What does that have to do with anything?

right.text: it says furry room not pokemon room

left.text: I could just say poof, I'm an anthropomorphic raccoon, whoopie, the point is, is that you don't have to take a furry form to be a fur o.O;

right.text: and you shouldn't be able to talk

left.text: all you can say is your name

right.text: Oh, well, I'm sorry I'm not real enough for you.
